00040 class FileIO : public QObject

00058       { act_file = file; };
00059     QString getActFilePath() 
00060       { return act_file; };
00062     QString getActFileName() { QFileInfo fi(act_file); return fi.fileName(); };
00064     QString getActExportFileName() { QFileInfo fi(act_exportfile); return fi.fileName(); };
00065 
00067     QString getEmptyFieldString() { return "<none>"; };
